ISSUE.TITLE: XSS vulnerability via CustomerFullName in order list
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION:
nopCommerce version: release-4.70.2 and in develop branch Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. create user with some script tag in first- or lastname. Like: `` 2. buy a product 3. then as an admin go to the portal 4. show orders 5. the alert will show before loading the list Exact location of the vulnerability: /src/Presentation/Nop.Web/Areas/Admin/Views/Order/List.cshtml Line: 418 ``return `${row.CustomerFullName}
${data}`;`` How to fix: use the textrenderer to show the CustomerFullName and probably the data (email) too: ``var textRenderer = $.fn.dataTable.render.text().display;`` ``return `${textRenderer(row.CustomerFullName)}
${textRenderer(data)}`;``
